@zheng-xq

That's why can only have slightly less than 1/2 of the GPU memory for a single variable.

This also happens with multiple variables, but not with int types or (at least some) other initializers.

One would think that constants would be the easiest to initialize in-place rather than copying them from the CPU and via a GPU temporary.
